collector:SoulHarvest.NAME: Soul Harvest
collector:SoulHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL if Fatal, Collect them. NL Exhaust.

collector:Contemplate.NAME: Contemplate
collector:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your Collection. Put it in your hand.
UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your Collection. Put it in your hand and Upgrade it.
